text: so I'm little in the road 300 days a
year my schedule is pretty grueling I
tour on average between 230 250 shows a
year every single year when we do let's
say 250 shows we're adding in 50 more
dates of just travel dates so I'm little
in the road 300 days of the year like I
never get 8 hours because it's really
difficult to find like adequate amount

full you should be getting eight hours
so you know repair your brain your brain
works properly and you prepare your

average I probably get it's more like

we were like a moving train that just
doesn't stop

and I have to ask myself the question I
